forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
